data.name: Retirement Access Account
data.description: An everyday bank account designed for eligible retirees, which earns split interest on balances.

features.additionalInfo: Customers may be reimbursed for any unauthorised transactions provided that the customer has not contributed to the loss and contacted us promptly

features.additionalValue: Card Lock, card feature through the Mobile Banking App
features.additionalInfo: Customers can temporarily lock their debit card associated with the bank account, using the mobile banking app if they lose or misplace their card, for up to 15 days

features.additionalValue: Cardless Cash, feature through the Mobile Banking app
features.additionalInfo: Cardless Cash can be used to withdraw cash from any St.George, BankSA, Bank of Melbourne and Westpac ATM without a debit card using an iPhone, Android and Windows Phone.

features.additionalValue: Spend Tracker, feature through the Mobile Banking app
features.additionalInfo: Groups your transactions into categories to give you helpful insights on your spending habits

features.additionalValue: Quick balance, feature through the Mobile Banking app
features.additionalInfo: Customers can see available balances in their accounts at a glance on your smartphone or watch

features.additionalValue: Keep track of your account activity (balances, deposits and withdrawals). Turn on Transaction Notifications via Online or Mobile Banking to receive updates on when you spend and receive money into your transaction account. Choose from receiving updates via SMS, Email or Mobile Notification.
Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Tap & Pay, Beem It
features.additionalInfo: Multiple ways to pay, securely, with mobile wallet. Pay on the go simply and securely from your mobile device at millions of stores worldwide, where contactless payments are accepted - compatible with Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Tap & Pay. Beem It: an app that links to your debit card to make, receive and split payments fast - no matter who the customer banks with.
No ATM withdrawal fee at any major bank ATM in Australia and over 50,000 ATMs around the world via the Global ATM Alliance and partner ATMs (other fees may apply)
BankSA has an extensive branch network that provides the complete range of banking services to our customers. Our friendly staff are on hand to help you in any of our branches and over the phone

features.additionalValue: Fingerprint sign in, feature through Mobile Banking app
features.additionalInfo: Customers can sign in to the mobile banking app simply and securely using their fingerprint on compatible devices.
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.

Offset : An account offering unlimited access. The account can also be used as an offset facility linked to a Home Loan. If an interest offset facility is available for your account, you may request us to link your account to an eligible loan account you hold with us. Linking  your account to a loan account may reduce the amount of interest payable on the loan account. No interest will be paid to you on your account while that account is linked to a loan account under an interest offset facility (including if the balance of your account exceeds the amount owing on the linked loan account). Details of how an interest  offset facility may reduce the interest payable on your loan account are set out in the terms and conditions applying to your loan account.
Statements : We will send statement every 6 monthly, or more frequently on request
You can pay bills using BPAY
You can make direct debits and periodical payments

Gambling block requests : The gambling block is a feature available on Visa Debit Cards and Freedom Cards. On eligible cards, the feature is, by default, unblocked, unless  otherwise requested by you. When the gambling block is enabled on your card, we may decline authorisation requests that are identified with the merchant category code for gambling. We will continue to decline these card authorisation requests until you request to unblock your card. The unblock request may take up to 2 days to process.

Electronic Statements : As an alternative to receiving paper statements in the mail, electronic statements and other important information on one or more of your eligible  deposit accounts may be given via Internet Banking together with an email notifying you when the statement is available. You may agree or consent to electronic  statements, or we may notify you that statements will be made available electronically instead of by mail.
We provide the following features : Cheque Access, Stopping Cheque payments, Periodical payments or regular transfers, Direct debits, Recurring payments

features.additionalValue: Visa Debit Card (or Freedom Card on request) if you have an Australian residential address.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Personal customers who are aged 55 years and over who tell us they are retired.

eligibility.additionalValue: Those with an Australian residential address and who are currently in Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be retired to be eligible for this product

fees.name: Overseas Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The fee is Nil ($0) for cash withdrawals from Global ATM Alliance and Westpac Group partner ATMs. To find an overseas ATM visit the link below

fees.name: Periodical Payment
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for an automated transfer of funds that we make on a regular basis at your request from your account to another specific account. The fee is charged at the time the transaction occurs.

fees.name: Cash withdrawals Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Cash withdrawals on major bank ATMs in Australia (Certain ATM providers may still charge a fee)

fees.name: Frequent Statement
fees.additionalInfo: An additional statement provided to you.

fees.name: St.George, BankSA or Bank of Melbourne branded ATM mini transaction history request
fees.additionalInfo: A list of recent transactions using a St.George, BankSA or Bank of Melbourne branded ATM or Electronic Agency.
